abilities.name: Bestial Prophet
abilities.rule: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, add 1 to the Hit roll.

abilities.name: Sacrificial Blessing
abilities.rule: While this model is leading a unit, in your Shooting phase and the Fight phase, each time that unit is selected to shoot or fight, this model can use this ability. If it does, select one Bodyguard model in that unit; that Bodyguard model is destroyed and, until the end of the phase, add D3 to the Attacks and Strength characteristics of Psychic weapons equipped by this model.
